page.title: 04Pembrey Fair
page.content:
Pembrey Fair (June 11th) or Ffair Gwsberys as it is called in Welsh,like countless other fairs coincided with some church function or celebration, particularly so as the word fair means holiday. It has a long history in Pembrey, and its emphasis and purpose has changed from age to age. Nowadays a funfair comes to the field near the church.All the children love the fair and look forward to its coming every year. This little rhyme has been learnt by the children of Pembrey for a hundred years and is still learnt today.
Hwre!Hwre! Ffair Penbre, Paste gwsberys, A disied o de.
